You were generous, but I'm not getting taken advantage of that easily. I'll give you a small share, but I'm keeping most of the pot.
Let's split it evenly this time. It's the fairest way to go, and we both get a decent amount.
I'm not sold on the even split, but I'll give you a bit more than before. Don't think you're getting off that easy, though!

I'm ready to meet you in the middle. Let's end this before we both lose more money to inflation.
